addColonyNodeView(ColonyNodeView, int, int) - Method in class ColonyView
add the specifed ColonyNode to this view use this method to add individual colony node views to this view since the colony is represented as a two-dimensional grid, each node view can be represented by an (x,y), or (row, column) coordinate pair

ColonyView - Class in <Unnamed>
class ColonyView provides a graphical view for the ant colony this class is a container for the views for the individual nodes of the colony
ColonyView(int, int) - Constructor for class ColonyView
create a new ColonyView with the specified height and width height is measured as the number of nodes along the Y axis width is measured as the number of nodes along the X axis

setBalaCount(int) - Method in class ColonyNodeView

setForagerCount(int) - Method in class ColonyNodeView

setID(String) - Method in class ColonyNodeView
set the value for the ID label
setPheromoneLevel(int) - Method in class ColonyNodeView
display the level of pheromone in the node represented by this view the amount of pheromone is displayed in 2 ways: 1) numerically 2) by the background color: a) 0 units: no color b) 1 - 199 units: violet c) 200 - 399 units: blue d) 400 - 599 units: green e) 600 - 799 units: yellow f) 800 - 999 units: orange g) >= 1000 units: red
setQueen(boolean) - Method in class ColonyNodeView
display whether or not the queen ant is present in the node represented by this view if queen is present this view's background color is dark gray if the queen is not present this view's background color is the color of a normal node
setScoutCount(int) - Method in class ColonyNodeView
display the number of scouts in the node represented by this view
setSoldierCount(int) - Method in class ColonyNodeView
display the number of soldiers in the node represented by this view

SimulationEventListener - Interface in <Unnamed>
